import React from 'react'; import PropertyBookingForm from './PropertyBookingForm'; import PropertyHighlights from './PropertyHighlights'; import PropertyMap from './PropertyMap'; const PropertyDetails = ({data}) => { if(!data) return null; const center = {lat: data.lat, lng: data.lon}; console.log(center); console.log(data); return(

{data.type}

{data.name}

{data.location}

{data.maxGuests} guests

{data.beds} Beds

{data.rooms} Rooms

{data.details}

) } export default PropertyDetails;
